mapper.select: SELECT d.sales_ord_de_code sales_ord_de_code , o.ord_code , o.ord_date ord_date , a.act_name act_name , o.ord_sts ord_sts , p.prod_name prod_name , d.prcs_rq_amt prcs_rq_amt , d.dev_date dev_date , d.dev_yn dev_yn , o.ord_code ord_code , e.emp_code emp_code FROM sales_ord o JOIN sales_ord_de d ON (o.ord_code = d.ord_code) LEFT JOIN com_prod p ON (d.prod_code = p.prod_code) LEFT JOIN com_act a ON (o.act_code = a.act_code) LEFT JOIN com_emp e ON (o.emp_code = e.emp_code) ORDER BY o.ord_code DESC

SELECT d.sales_ord_de_code , d.ord_code , p.prod_name , d.prcs_rq_amt , d.dev_date , o.ord_sts , e.emp_code , e.emp_name , d.dev_yn , o.ord_date , a.act_name , o.act_code , d.prod_code FROM sales_ord_de d JOIN com_prod p ON (d.prod_code = p.prod_code) JOIN sales_ord o ON (d.ord_code = o.ord_code) JOIN com_emp e ON (o.emp_code = e.emp_code) JOIN com_act a ON (o.act_code = a.act_code)
AND a.act_code LIKE '%' || #{actCode} || '%'
AND p.prod_code LIKE '%' || #{prodCode} || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(o.ord_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{startDate}
AND TO_CHAR(o.ord_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{endDate}
AND d.dev_yn != 'N'
AND d.dev_yn != 'Y'
ORDER BY d.dev_date, o.ord_code DESC
SELECT act_code, act_name, find_cdnm('0J',act_sts) act_sts, find_cdnm('ACT-TYPE',act_kind) act_kind FROM com_act WHERE act_kind = 'ACT-TYPE1' AND ACT_STS = 'D1' ORDER BY act_code DESC
SELECT prod_code, prod_name, prod_unit, prod_std FROM com_prod WHERE prod_kind = 'C' ORDER BY prod_code DESC

SELECT d.sales_ord_de_code , d.ord_code , p.prod_name , d.prcs_rq_amt , d.dev_date , o.ord_sts , e.emp_code , e.emp_name , d.dev_yn , o.ord_date , a.act_name , o.act_code , d.prod_code FROM sales_ord_de d JOIN com_prod p ON (d.prod_code = p.prod_code) JOIN sales_ord o ON (d.ord_code = o.ord_code) JOIN com_emp e ON (o.emp_code = e.emp_code) JOIN com_act a ON (o.act_code = a.act_code) ORDER BY d.dev_date, o.ord_code DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'ORD-' || TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'rrMMdd') || LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(ord_code, -3)),0), 3, '0') FROM sales_ord WHERE SUBSTR(ord_code, 5, 6) = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'rrMMdd')
INSERT INTO sales_ord_de(sales_ord_de_code, ord_code, prod_code, prcs_rq_amt, dev_date ) VALUES (get_primaryCode('salesOrdDeCode'), #{ordCode}, #{prodCode}, #{prcsRqAmt}, #{devDate} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sales_ord WHERE ord_code IN ( SELECT a.ord_code FROM sales_ord a LEFT JOIN sales_ord_de b ON(a.ord_code = b.ord_code) WHERE sales_ord_de_code IS NULL)
mapper.select:
SELECT prod_code, prod_name, prod_unit, prod_std FROM com_prod
WHERE prod_name LIKE '%' || #{prodName} || '%'
AND prod_kind = 'C' ORDER BY prod_code DESC

SELECT act_code, act_name, find_cdnm('0J',act_sts) act_sts, find_cdnm('ACT-TYPE',act_kind) act_kind FROM com_act
WHERE act_name LIKE '%' || #{actName} || '%'
AND act_kind = 'ACT-TYPE1' ORDER BY act_code DESC
